column2: Some unkindly called this vice president & successor "Nixon's revenge" (US Vice Presidents)
Reportedly this "Rough Rider" once compared McKinley's backbone to a chocolate elcair (US Vice Presidents)
Later vice president he 1st visited the capital while leading Boy Scouts from Minnesota(US Vice Presidents)

column3:
he was officially divorced for adultery on the day he died (US Vice Presidents)
George Bush, Born in 1924 -- at 18 he became youngest naval pilot in WWII (US Vice Presidents)
Hubert Humphrey, He & his future running mate Lyndon Johnson began their Senate careers at the same time (US Vice Presidents)
Texas, George M. Dallas was VP when this state joined the Union
Aaron Burr, 3 years after the famous duel he was tried for treason & acquitted
John Tyler, William Henry Harrison's VP; he was the 1st to replace a president who'd died in office (US Vice Presidents)
Alben Barkley, Harry Truman was exceptionally pleased with the performance of this vice president (US Vice Presidents)
